## NodeDocument class

A limited Node implementation for the DOM Document to enable cross-environment creation of `canvas` elements using `document.createElement("canvas")`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NodeDocument implements IDocument 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createElement(el)](./canvas-cleave.nodedocument.createelement.md) |  | Create an element. Only "canvas" is supported by this implementation. |
|  [eject()](./canvas-cleave.nodedocument.eject.md) | <code>static</code> | Reverses the NodeDocument injection from [NodeDocument.inject()](./canvas-cleave.nodedocument.inject.md) by undefining the global.document variable if it's an instance of [NodeDocument](./canvas-cleave.nodedocument.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [inject()](./canvas-cleave.nodedocument.inject.md) | <code>static</code> | Injects an instance of NodeDocument into the global object as "document" if one doesn't exist already (ie. it does nothing in the browser nor on subsequent calls). |
